message.body: Hey, happy birthday.
Hey, thanks!
Do you have a power point night for auction week this year?
grad schools at the same time. This one is called "self helping for broken humans"
Yes! Its on monday the 10th. I have some little flyers with the wrong date in west phl. I am running kind of a shitshow this year because im applying to
Oh awesome, I will come out. Where are you applying to grad school? I was surprised to see Kay's work on display at my school! There's a couch wheat paste too

￼Check out this picture of israel and palestine that one of my clients did. Zero input from staff, i just found it on a pile of papers. Might be too small to read unless you have one of those smartphones.
Fortunately my phone is super smart. Do you know who made it? Looks like HAARP is at it again...
Its this autistic girl named andrea. Shes from romania
What kind of other stuff does she make?
Pictures of her doll collection. And national tragedies like 911 and jfk.
But mostly dolls. Like real wackadoodle looking dolls.
Wow..wow.
We came out of retrograde on Tuesday, my mistake. We are in post retrograde until dec 14..things are slowly getting better
Science robots from nasa found ice on mercury, i read it in the paper today.
Yeah I read about , organic matter too. Ice on the planet closest to the sun..
That means aliens
My Egyptian archaeology professor finally said the word aliens this week, I've been waiting all semester
What are you going to learn about ancient astronauts?
So many secrets. The paper I'm writing now is about gobekli tepe
What is gobleki tepe?
It's a ritual site from the tenth century BCE with sophisticated wall carvings and giant monoliths. It's from a time when people were hunter gatherers and previously considered primitive.
The people that used it covered it with twenty feet of sand when they left.
Tonite at space 1026, self help pwrpnt comedy, 8pm show, 730 doors, 1026 arch st. FREE
Would it be uncouth to fill my pockets with beer?
Its encouraged.
I'm going to practice self help by studying hard tonight, but skool is finished this week, maybe I will see u soon
Is this a PSA?
Nah, just santa claus.
Cool I will watch my thrash cans. Will u be at comedy dreamz Tuesday?
Yeah, i will. Would you want to hang out beforehand?
That'd be cool what were u thinking?
Nothing in particular. Just whatevz.
I love whatevz..
Want to meet for food around seven? Someplace with beer!
7ish sounds good. I have no preference.
I want to be close to Barbary bc I will be wo bike. 7:30 at Johnny Brenda's?
Perfect
Hey, are you close? Im getting ready to leave.
I'm still waiting for the el may be a little late
Ok no problem
Ok eastbound
All the way in the back
￼The play tomorrow is at 8pm at wolf cycles, and there seems to be music too, so no hurry. The play is called Mother Mother Ocean, and it costs 3 dollars.
Cool, thanks, I will probably come out. #itwasgoodseeingyou
I'm wearing your shirt..even the things that aren't swasticas seem to capture the essence of swasticas
Yo. does you gots a twitter?
Sorta, I only made it to subscribe to Ella's
Woah, she tweets?
Like a lot. Why do you ask if I have one?
I got one and im trying to understand it
Maybe Ella could explain it?
Shes probably more tech savvy than both of us.
Probably, but she would be a little condescending
The realest
Do you know about Mel's hole?
No idea
I will send you a link to the coast to coast audio. Listen to all of it, it's so good
Hahaha yes! Coast to coast rules
Is that like blue hole in New Jersey?
It's a good one. Part of the hollow earth theory. This guy has land with a bottomless hole. Then the gov took it, then he found another
One
Sorta, but they lowered a sheep into it and then cut a tumor out of it and a highly intelligent seal was born
Art bell is losing his shit
Ha
I'll say it, you'll hear it, you'll do it, I'll get it, you'll learn it, I'll live with it and you'll die without it
Hahaha neck tattoos, sheesh!
Have you ever been to the abandoned pa turnpike? I'm trying to go there this weekend
No I never have, my friend went and said he couldn't walk all the way through the tunnel. Too scurred
You have to go through the tunnel first?
I think the tunnel is optional
Did u go to the turnpike?
I'm in Pittsburgh now, going to try and find it on the way back tomorrow, totally misjudged how far it was from pgh
I thought it was like mid west pa. Good luck!!!
It is, closer to the middle. I'll send you pictures
￼It was so spooky but I didn't get picked up by any canibals
Was there a barking German Shepard with live ammo strapped to its back?
￼Just some ads for goth restaurants
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HtaSWZM2mMU&sns=em
Pillz and wine
Everything about that video blows my mind, especially the weird video art and nazi van at the end
Yeah it's all magical. The geographic panels of static are nice
No phone, I meant geometric
Hey is the pddc show tonight?
Yeah, until 9
Sorry I missed it, I'm on spring break next week if u want to ride bikes or drink beers
It's my spring break too, got the week off
What! Do you have something going on?
Taking a week off, interview at Pratt and whateverz
Cool good luck with ur interview
Thanx!
Is that the portfolio u decided on?
Yup! And this￼
Lets drive to the ocean or something. MTV spring break
Yeah! I would like that. I'm going to be in NYC for a few days starting tomorrow, but later in the week would be good
Cool let me know when u r back. Don't forget your mandarin wedges
Hey! I have a friend at Bryn Mawr who wants to do art therapy, and she's looking for an internship, anything at all, do you think there is anything she could do at pddc?
Yeah, she should email Linda Price at lprice@arcpddc.org and mention you and me.
Awesome, her name is Lija, and she's a good egg. Thanks!
How have you been?
Good, my brains all melty, but school is done in two weeks. Got accepted for this year long curating thing at school, found out today good newz
What's the curating thing?
It's like an intensive program with the head of special collections, curating a show of their art collection for credit. I get to do it instead of a class next yr
That's great! Is that an assistantship?
No, it's a type of class Bryn Mawr offers, it's meant to give field experience. It's pretty selective, had an annoying application process. What's new w u?
I've been super busy, just finished 2 zines put out by other people who want to "publish" my stuff. Also got into Pratt and preparing for that.
Awesome! Congrats. When do you move?

Orientation is August 23, so some time around then. NYC is intimidatingly expensive and that's my biggest concern. They offered me some scholarship money and an assistantship, so that's a small cushion
I've been feeling more goth than ever before, but also more positive than ever, basically
Maybe there is a correlation? I've been pretty posi too, maybe the haarp frequency changed?
I think that could be it
spring break 4ever
http://youtu.be/r5-fXh-VP5g
I need serious extensions
Me too!
Yes!
